annotations.description: Defines how to deploy the reverse proxy server
Exposes and load balances the application pods

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN
parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.

parameters.name: APP_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: Application image name.

parameters.name: APP_IMAGE_NAMESPACE
parameters.description: Namespace containing application images.

parameters.name: APP_DEPLOYMENT_TAG
parameters.displayName: Image tag to watch for changes and trigger deployment.
parameters.description: Image tag to watch for changes and trigger deployment.

parameters.name: HTTP_BASIC
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, use HTTP_BASIC in your nginx config and provide the value here that you want in nginx config, e.g., auth_basic 'restricted'

parameters.name: USERNAME
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, the username of the ONE user

parameters.name: PASSWORD
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, the password of the ONE user

parameters.name: HTTP_BASIC1
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, use HTTP_BASIC1 in your nginx config and provide the value here that you want in nginx config, e.g., auth_basic 'restricted'

parameters.name: USERNAME1
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, the username of the ONE user

parameters.name: PASSWORD1
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, the password of the ONE user

parameters.name: HTTP_BASIC2
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, use HTTP_BASIC2 in your nginx config and provide the value here that you want in nginx config, e.g., auth_basic 'restricted'

parameters.name: USERNAME2
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, the username of the ONE user

parameters.name: PASSWORD2
parameters.description: For very simple HTTP Basic authentication, the password of the ONE user

parameters.name: NGINX__AJAX__SERVER_NAME
parameters.displayName: Nginx Proxy Host for Ajax site
parameters.description: The HTTP Header Host value we want to give to the downstream HTTP server

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_PUBLIC__SERVER_NAME
parameters.description: The HTTP Header Host value we want to give to the downstream HTTP server

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_PUBLIC__PROXY__ROOT
parameters.displayName: Host that receives incoming www.* requests
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the PUBLIC microservice.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__SERVER_NAME
parameters.description: The HTTP Header Host value we want to give to the downstream HTTP server

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__ROOT
parameters.displayName: Host that receives incoming web requests
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the application.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__API
parameters.displayName: Host that receives incoming web requests for API
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the application's API.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY_DEPLOY_CONFIG__API
parameters.displayName: A way to inject Nginx params into the config

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__API_EXPORT
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the GEO-DATA-EXPORT microservice.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY_DEPLOY_CONFIG__API_EXPORT
parameters.displayName: The API Key to authenticate against the GEO-DATA-EXPORT microservice

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__API_GEOCODER
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the GEOCODER microservice.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY_KEY__API_GEOCODER
parameters.displayName: The API Key to authenticate against the GEOCODER microservice

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY_DEPLOY_CONFIG__API_GEOCODER
parameters.displayName: A way to inject nginx params into the config

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__API_PUBLIC
parameters.displayName: Host that receives incoming web requests
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the application's API.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY_DEPLOY_CONFIG__API_PUBLIC
parameters.displayName: A way to inject nginx params into the config

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__EGUIDE
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the EGUIDE microservice.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__PARSE
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the PARSE microservice.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY_DEPLOY_CONFIG__PARSE
parameters.description: Enable injection of nginx configs on the parse_mount route.

parameters.name: NGINX__EPIC_ADMIN__PROXY__UPLOADCENTRE
parameters.description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the EAO Inspections webapp.

name: NGINX_EXPORT_URL
description: The default URL to use when proxying requests to the GEO-DATA-EXPORT microservice.
